casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Lillian A. Loughlin (9647)

Dupont, C. J., O’Connell and Norcott, Js.

Argued June 5—decision released June 25, 1991 Vincent P. McCarthy, for the appellant (defendant). Carolyn K. Longstreth, assistant state’s attorney, with whom were John O'Reilly, assistant state’s attorney, and, on the brief, John Bailey, state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
